Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/12 3:30: Afternoon Folks! We have a stellar weekend ahead, so whos ready to rumble! For your Saturday, youll be taking turns on 77 open trails spanning across 461 skiable acres. Of which, 52 trails will receive fresh stripes overnight. Alongside, 11 lifts will be spinning with no anticipated delays. Join us Saturday for the In A Pickle Rails jam happening on the bottom of Suntanner and the first day of Demo and Dine. Additionally, the Sunbowl will open tomorrow, December 13, for lift, lodge, and parking access! Sunrise Express will be open for the season, weather permitting. PLEASE NOTE: Sunbowls terrain is for expert skiers and riders only to start, with natural snow coverage, ungroomed conditions and unmarked hazards. All beginner skiers and Riders should stick to the main face of the mountain. Along with that, snowmaking is set to resume within the next 24 hours, with the goal to open Black Bear as soon as possible from the top, Big Ben, tubing, and other Sunbowl trails. Lets Weekend! 

Safety Tip: Please do not duck ropes and stay off closed terrain. Doing so risks getting your pass pulled.

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

The Nordic Center is now open for Nordic Skiing and Snowshoeing! Enjoy the peaceful 10km of trails with friends or family.  

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
